name: Woldlab BioHub
short_description:
The goal is twofold:
1) Allow Biologists to ask (multi-)genome-scale questions in a standard way of very diverse biological data by the spatial relationships of DNA features.
2) Make it easier for programmers to write large scale bioinformatic tools.
